title: Memoirs of a Demigod
description: Everyone, at some time in their life will experience something that they cannot explain. For most people it is a onetime occurrence while for others, itâ€™s more than just once. Imagine having experiences of that nature occur on a regular basis that you cannot always control. In "Memoirs of a Demigod", this is the life of the main character Glen McShaw as he tries to live both a normal public life, while also living a private secret life of dealing with experiences within paranormal and psychic realms.
author: Roger McKasson
